text: @RealDeanCain My nurse friend works 12 hr shifts taking care of COVID-19 patients & wears a mask every day without complaint & her brain is just fine. I think your "dain bramage" is a pre-existing condition. So many brave men & women have sacrificed much more than you for this country. #shame
